languages.text: Очнувшись на свалке трупов, Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а}, что е{mf|го|е} обувь исчезла. Отыскать ее — в некотором смысле дело чести.
After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.
languages.original_text: Очнувшись на свалке трупов, Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а}, что е{mf|го|е} обувь исчезла. Отыскать ее — в некотором смысле дело чести.

traits.locale_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, Lord Captain found that {mf|his|her} boots have gone missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.
After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.
After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.

languages.text: Après avoir repris connaissance dans la décharge funéraire, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a découvert que ses bottes avaient disparu. Les trouver est une question d'honneur.
languages.original_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir repris connaissance dans la décharge funéraire, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a découvert que ses bottes avaient disparu. Les trouver est une question d'honneur.

languages.text: 行商浪人在尸堆前恢复了知觉，却发现{mf|他|她}的靴子不见了。得把靴子找回来，毕竟这关乎脸面。
languages.original_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在尸堆前恢复了知觉，却发现{mf|他|她}的靴子不见了。得把靴子找回来，毕竟这关乎脸面。

languages.text: 死体廃棄場で我に返ったロード・キャプテンは、ブーツを履いていないことに気づいた。ブーツを探すのは、名誉のためだ。
languages.original_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.

traits.locale_text: 死体廃棄場で我に返ったロード・キャプテンは、ブーツを履いていないことに気づいた。ブーツを探すのは、名誉のためだ。

languages.text: Nachdem {mf|er|sie} inmitten all der Leichen wieder zu Sinnen gekommen ist, hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} festgestellt, dass {mf|seine|ihre} Stiefel verschwunden sind. Sie zu finden, ist eine Frage der Ehre.
languages.original_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem {mf|er|sie} inmitten all der Leichen wieder zu Sinnen gekommen ist, hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} festgestellt, dass {mf|seine|ihre} Stiefel verschwunden sind. Sie zu finden, ist eine Frage der Ehre.

languages.text: Tras recuperar el conocimiento en el vertedero de cadáveres, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán descubre que sus botas han desaparecido. Encontrarlas es cuestión de honor.
languages.original_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.

traits.locale_text: Tras recuperar el conocimiento en el vertedero de cadáveres, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán descubre que sus botas han desaparecido. Encontrarlas es cuestión de honor.

languages.text: Ceset çöplüğünde kendine gelen Lord Kaptan, botlarının ortadan kaybolduğunu fark etti. Botlarını bulmak, onun için bir onur meselesi.
languages.original_text: After coming to {mf|his|her} senses at the corpse dump, the Lord Captain discovered that {mf|his|her} boots were missing. Finding them is a matter of honour.
